statements: DELETE FROM payment_status_updates WHERE user_id = 100 AND status_message = 'Success';
DELETE FROM payment_status_updates WHERE status_id = 100 AND user_id = 500;
DELETE FROM payments WHERE transaction_id = 100 AND payment_amount > 50.00
DELETE FROM successful_transactions WHERE transaction_id = 100 AND user_id = 500;
DELETE FROM pending_transactions WHERE amount > 100 AND status = 'pending';
DELETE FROM payments WHERE user_id = 500 AND payment_date > '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM notifications WHERE user_id = 456 AND notification_id = 789;
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE status = 'failed' AND amount > 1000;
DELETE FROM payments WHERE payment_id IN (SELECT payment_id FROM transactions WHERE status = 'failed');
